summary:
TruthGPT : Elon's Truth Seeking Ai - An artificial intelligence system designed to seek out and evaluate information in order to arrive at the most accurate and reliable understanding of the world.

 More about TruthGPT - Elon Musk says he’s working on “TruthGPT,” a ChatGPT alternative that acts as a “maximum truth-seeking AI.”

 Tokenomics - 1 Billion Total Supply, 0% Tax, Liquidity Burnt

 TruthGPT - The $TRUTH token is a community-led initiative that aims to support Elon Musk's vision of creating a truth-seeking AI.
